sections.MISSION: Apache Troop, 1ST SQDN conducts a M240 qualification range at Range 202A on 29 November 2023 IOT qualify Soldiers with the weapon system and better prepare gunners for SABER STRIKE 24’.
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to qualify soldiers on the M240 machine gun IOT build confidence and lethality while simultaneously setting conditions for SS24.
sections.KEY TASKS:
– All Soldiers get an opportunity to shoot weapon system All Soldiers build confidence on weapon system All Soldiers receive at least a Marksman qualification
Range is completed with no loss of equipment or injury to soldiers
sections.EXECUTION:
All range participates will attend a safety brief by Range OIC and RSO prior to range operations. Firers and Assistant Gunners will use the principles of direct fire control IAW TC 3-22.240 IOT engage targets from 600 to 1000 meters. Range OIC/NCOIC and safeties will ensure all equipment and soldiers are accounted for upon completion of each iteration and range operations. Firers will receive 50 rounds to verify zero at 10m, 50 rounds for confirmation of zero at 500m, then receive 200 rounds to qualify day. If firer’s fail to qual the first time, they will receive remedial training by coaches. Only coaches will re-certify firers for a second and third attempt at qualifying. Only firers who qualified during day will shoot at night, night shoot will consist of 200 rounds to qualify with.
CL I- A-M-M
CL III- N/A
CL IV- 10X Packs IR Chem lights
CL V – A131 DODIC: 6000 7.62 caliber CL VIII – Individual IFACs and CLS for medic
Task to Subordinate Units
1 PLT- 2X PAX gate guard requirement, 1X lane safety 2 PLT– Range OIC, RSO, tower graders, ammo detail NCO
3 PLT– Provide one lane safety, 2 PAX ammo detail
HQ – MEV with medical support
4.
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
The Uniform for this event will be ACUs with boots, gloves, eye pro, ACH, ear pro, NVGs, IOTV with kit, knee pads, and hydration source, BINOS
Each TRP will ensure all Soldier’s are in Dragoon standard and have received M240 PMI and familiarization.
